fields.label: Google Fonts URL
fields.name: google_fonts_url
fields.instructions: Go to fonts.google.com and generate your url and paste it here

choices.header-no-overlap: Site header does not overlap page header

fields.label: Excerpt Length
fields.name: excerpt_length
fields.instructions: How many words do you want the post excerpts to display?

fields.message: Check this if you want to finish the sentence of the excerpt (No weird cuts).
fields.label: Finish sentence
fields.name: finish_sentence

fields.message: Do you want to use the news page header for your single post page (instead of the post image)?
fields.label: Use News Page Header for Single Post
fields.name: news_header

fields.message: Do you want to hide the news page header content for your single post page?
fields.label: Hide News Page Title
fields.name: news_title

fields.label: Copyright Text
fields.name: copyright_text
fields.instructions: Use instead of default copyright txt ( [company name] © [current year] ). Will still add copyright symbol and current year at the end
